metadata.title: CVE-2020-11096 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In FreeRDP before version 2.1.2, there is a global OOB read inupdate_read_cache_bitmap_v3_order. As a workaround, one can disable bitmapcache with -bitmap-cache (default). This is fixed in version 2.1.2.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
